summary: An email from an FBI forensic accountant scheduling a meeting on October 24, 2019, at 290 Broadway in New York to discuss a financial update regarding the Epstein case. The meeting is to be held in a criminal conference room.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the email who is scheduling a meeting to discuss a financial update on the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein Financial Update Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled by an FBI forensic accountant to discuss a financial update regarding the Epstein case, to be held at 290 Broadway, 9th floor criminal conference room.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

locations: 290 Broadway, 9th floor criminal conference room, New York
keyFacts: An FBI forensic accountant scheduled a meeting for October 24, 2019, regarding a financial update on the Epstein case.
The meeting location was 290 Broadway, 9th floor criminal conference room in New York.
The email was sent on October 16, 2019, indicating ongoing financial investigation into Epstein's affairs after his death in August 2019.
